mapper.insert: insert into t_customer_info (id, cust_type, in_code, out_code, cust_name, cust_en_name, cust_abbreviation, frozen_sales, frozen_delivery, frozen_order, frozen_Invoice, business_type, is_license, cust_role, cust_mobile, cust_email, cust_web, is_white, regist_time, corportae_assets, staff_number, developers_number, business_introduction, advantages_introduction, approve_user, approve_status, approve_time, approve_remark, active, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{custType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custAbbreviation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frozenSales,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{frozenDelivery,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{frozenOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{frozenInvoice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isLicense,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{custRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custWeb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isWhite,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{registTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{corportaeAssets,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{staffNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{developersNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{businessIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{advantagesIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approveUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{approveStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{approveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{approveRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{active,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

update t_customer_info
cust_type = #{custType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
in_code = #{inCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
out_code = #{outCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cust_name = #{custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cust_en_name = #{custEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cust_abbreviation = #{custAbbreviation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
frozen_sales = #{frozenSales,jdbcType=INTEGER},
frozen_delivery = #{frozenDelivery,jdbcType=INTEGER},

frozen_Invoice = #{frozenInvoice,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_customer_info set cust_type = #{custType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, in_code = #{inCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, out_code = #{outCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cust_name = #{custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cust_en_name = #{custEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cust_abbreviation = #{custAbbreviation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, frozen_sales = #{frozenSales,jdbcType=INTEGER}, frozen_delivery = #{frozenDelivery,jdbcType=INTEGER}, frozen_order = #{frozenOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, frozen_Invoice = #{frozenInvoice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, business_type = #{businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_license = #{isLicense,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cust_role = #{custRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cust_mobile = #{custMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cust_email = #{custEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cust_web = #{custWeb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_white = #{isWhite,jdbcType=INTEGER}, regist_time = #{registTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, corportae_assets = #{corportaeAssets,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, staff_number = #{staffNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, developers_number = #{developersNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, business_introduction = #{businessIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, advantages_introduction = #{advantagesIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approve_user = #{approveUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, approve_status = #{approveStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, approve_time = #{approveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, approve_remark = #{approveRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, active = #{active,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select cust.id, cust.in_code, cust.out_code, cust.cust_name, cust.cust_en_name, cust.cust_abbreviation, cust.cust_mobile, cust.cust_email, cust.cust_web, cust.corportae_assets, cust.staff_number, cust.regist_time, cust.advantages_introduction, bank.bank_id, bank.cust_id, bank.bank_name, bank.bank_country, bank.bank_province, bank.bank_detail_info, bank.bank_account, bank.bank_bic, assets.assete_info_id, assets.cust_id, assets.assets_year, assets.assets_season, assets.assets_total, assets.assets_net, assets.revenue, assets.total_staff, business.bus_info_id, business.cust_id, business.business_year, business.product_line, business.revenue_pl_one, business.revenue_pl_two, business.revenue_pl_three, agent.agent_id, agent.cust_id, agent.bu, agent.pdt, agent.territory, agent.sales_model, agent.grade, agent.start_date, agent.end_date, file.file_id, file.cust_id, file.type, file.title, file.file_name, file.file_path, contact.contact_id, contact.cust_id, contact.contact_name, contact.mobile, contact.email, contact.department, contact.sub_department, contact.position, contact.equity_ratio, ship.ship_id, ship.cust_id, ship.corporate_type, ship.corporate_name, invoice.invoice_id, invoice.cust_id, invoice.purchasing_unit, invoice.shipping_address, invoice.shipping_mobile, invoice.taxpayer_registration_number, invoice.currency, sales.sales_id, sales.cust_id, sales.sales_organize, sales.distribution_channel, sales.delivery_plant, address.address_id, address.cust_id, address.address_type, address.country, address.province, address.city, address.district, address.address_detail, account.team_id, account.cust_id, account.account_mobile, account.role_type, account.account_name
from t_customer_info cust left join t_cust_bank_info bank on bank.cust_id = cust.id and bank.active=1 left join t_cust_assets_information assets on assets.cust_id = cust.id and assets.active=1 left join t_cust_business_information business on business.cust_id = cust.id and business.active =1 left join t_customer_agent agent on agent.cust_id = cust.id and agent.active=1 left join t_customer_file file on file.cust_id = cust.id and file.active=1 left join t_customer_contact contact on contact.cust_id = cust.id and contact.active=1 left join t_cust_corporate_relationship ship on ship.cust_id = cust.id and ship.active=1 left join t_cust_invoice_info invoice on invoice.cust_id = cust.id and invoice.active=1 left join t_cust_sales sales on sales.cust_id = cust.id and sales.active=1 left join t_customer_address address on address.cust_id = cust.id and address.active=1 left join t_customer_account_team account on account.cust_id = cust.id and account.active=1 where cust.business_type = 'A04' and cust.active =1 and cust.id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select cust.id, cust.in_code, cust.out_code, cust.cust_role, cust.business_type, cust.is_license, cust.cust_name, cust.cust_en_name, cust.cust_abbreviation, cust.cust_mobile, cust.cust_email, cust.cust_web, cust.corportae_assets, cust.staff_number, cust.developers_number, cust.regist_time, cust.advantages_introduction, cust.business_introduction, bank.bank_id, bank.cust_id, bank.bank_name, bank.bank_country, bank.bank_province, bank.bank_detail_info, bank.bank_account, bank.bank_bic, file.file_id, file.cust_id, file.type, file.title, file.file_name, file.file_path, contact.contact_id, contact.cust_id, contact.contact_name, contact.mobile, contact.email, contact.department, contact.sub_department, contact.position, contact.equity_ratio, ship.ship_id, ship.cust_id, ship.corporate_type, ship.corporate_name, invoice.invoice_id, invoice.cust_id, invoice.purchasing_unit, invoice.shipping_address, invoice.shipping_mobile, invoice.taxpayer_registration_number, invoice.currency, sales.sales_id, sales.cust_id, sales.sales_organize, sales.distribution_channel, sales.delivery_plant, address.address_id, address.cust_id, address.address_type, address.country, address.province, address.city, address.district, address.address_detail, account.team_id, account.cust_id, account.account_mobile, account.role_type, account.account_name, product.pro_id, product.cust_id, product.product, product.p_number_one, product.p_number_two, product.p_number_three, product.p_number_four, product.p_number_five, product.p_number_six
from t_customer_info cust left join t_cust_bank_info bank on bank.cust_id = cust.id and bank.active=1 left join t_customer_file file on file.cust_id = cust.id and file.active=1 left join t_customer_contact contact on contact.cust_id = cust.id and contact.active=1 left join t_cust_corporate_relationship ship on ship.cust_id = cust.id and ship.active=1 left join t_cust_invoice_info invoice on invoice.cust_id = cust.id and invoice.active=1 left join t_cust_sales sales on sales.cust_id = cust.id and sales.active=1 left join t_customer_address address on address.cust_id = cust.id and address.active=1 left join t_customer_account_team account on account.cust_id = cust.id and account.active=1 left join t_customer_product product on product.cust_id = cust.id and product.active =1 where cust.active =1 and cust.id=#{custId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select * from t_customer_info where active = 1 order by business_type desc
mapper.update: update t_customer_info set active =0 where id = #{custId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select cust_name, in_code, out_code from t_customer_info where active = 1 and create_user = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select a.business_type,b.email cust_email from t_customer_info a inner join t_customer_contact b on b.cust_id = a.id and b.type = 'C01' where a.cust_name = #{custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.active = 1 and b.email is not null
select * from t_customer_info where active =1 and out_code = #{outCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and out_code != '' and out_code is not null
select * from t_customer_info where active =1 and in_code = #{inCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from t_customer_info where active =1 and business_type = 'A04'
select * from t_customer_info where active =1 and business_type != 'A04' and cust_abbreviation =#{custAbbreviation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update t_customer_info set in_code = #{inCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where active =1 and id = #{custId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from t_customer_info where in_code = (select corporate_name from t_cust_corporate_relationship where corporate_type='Z002') and cust_name = #{custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and active = 1 limit 1
